pageContent: Objectives: To evaluate the accuracy of gadolinium-enhanced MRI in gauging the extent of the tissue damage induced by transrectal high intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) therapy and to assess how well the results obtained with this modality correlate with histological findings (control biopsies).

metaData.source:
High-intensity focused ultrasound: a potential salvage treatment for recurrent prostate cancer following radiotherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/16831068/
